sentences.english: It is an abuse of public resources and basically a kind of power abusiveness.
sentences.chinese: 喫空餉是一種濫用公共資源行爲，其實質是權力失範。

sentences.english: Freeloading refers to the action of getting salaries without going to work.
sentences.chinese: “喫空餉”，是指不上班但是照常領工資的行爲。

sentences.english: The soldiers were paid from the annona.
sentences.chinese: 士兵的餉金來自穀物稅。

definition: prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave

then/at once/always/(archaic) luggage rack on a chariot
to relegate a high official to a minor post in an outlying region (punishment in imperial China)/to banish or exile/(of immortals) to banish from Heaven/to censure/to blame
